729315f-a.text:
Richmond Avenue, at the N.E. corner of Amboy Road. The house belonged to L. Potesta (1898 map) and to
Selmo Abdelnour (1907).
May 16, 1932
P. L. Sperr

729314f-a.text:
Richmond Avenue, north side, west of Amboy Road, showing a
late nineteenth century home.
P.L. Sperr  April 30, 1933
